Wishing I had true Vertical Take off and Landing, but for now, this is fun.

"Niles"
Is this a mod? If so where did you find this?

well it is a mod file, the plane is, i found an F18 on an off site for kerbal stuff, flies great, all i did was assemble this model and cut n paste cfg files to get it working.

pm me.

"Niles"
